message: Let's be fair and efficient. I propose a 65/35 split to avoid further devaluation.
Your split seems unfair to me. I propose 60/40 in my favor.  Let's settle this quickly.
Bob, let's be realistic. Time is money, and we're both losing out. I propose a 55/45 split. It's better than what we'll get if we keep waiting.
Alice, this is going nowhere. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle with 52.5/47.5.  Accept this, and we both walk away with something.
